message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $18,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
